entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
